goals.title: Enhance Attendance System with AI-Driven Absence Prediction
goals.description: By September 26, 2025, develop and implement an AI-powered module within the existing attendance system that predicts employee absences with at least 80% accuracy. This module will proactively notify the relevant manager at least 24 hours in advance of predicted absences. The module will be integrated with existing HR data sources, ensuring data privacy and compliance. This supports the manager's goal by contributing to AI adoption within the Development - HKPL department.
goals.kpi: Percentage accuracy of AI-predicted employee absences (target: >=80%).
goals.companyTopBetAlignment: TRANSFORMING INTO AN AI COMPANY - This directly contributes to the company's transformation into an AI-driven organization by implementing an AI solution within a core department.
goals.framework3E: ELEVATE - This goal elevates existing attendance processes by integrating AI for predictive capabilities.
goals.coreValue: SIMPLIFY TO AMPLIFY - By automating absence prediction, the goal simplifies the management of employee attendance, freeing up managers' time.

goals.title: Standardize AI Model Validation Process for Attendance Prediction
goals.description: By December 31, 2024, create a standardized, documented validation process for the AI model used in the attendance prediction system. This process will include defined metrics, testing methodologies, and acceptance criteria to ensure consistent model performance and reliability. The validation process will be reviewed and approved by the Development - HKPL leadership team, contributing to the broader AI adoption strategy and addressing the manager's goal.
goals.kpi: Completion and approval of the standardized AI model validation process documentation by December 31, 2024.
goals.companyTopBetAlignment: INVESTING FOR SCALE & TRANSFORMING INTO AN AI COMPANY - Implementing a standardized validation process ensures the AI model is scalable and reliable as the company transforms into an AI-driven organization.
goals.framework3E: EXTEND - This goal extends the reliability and usability of the AI model across the department by ensuring it is thoroughly validated.
goals.coreValue: SHAPING TOMORROW TODAY - By creating a robust validation process, the company is making responsible choices to ensure the long-term reliability and effectiveness of AI solutions.

goals.title: Conduct a Post-Implementation Review of AI Attendance System
goals.description: By March 31, 2026, conduct a comprehensive post-implementation review of the AI-powered attendance prediction system, gathering feedback from managers and employees on its effectiveness and usability. The review will identify areas for improvement and document lessons learned to inform future AI implementations within the Development - HKPL department and contribute to the manager's goal of company-wide AI adoption. A report with actionable recommendations will be submitted to the Development - HKPL leadership team.
goals.kpi: Completion of the post-implementation review and submission of a report with actionable recommendations by March 31, 2026.
goals.companyTopBetAlignment: TRANSFORMING INTO AN AI COMPANY & EMPLOYEE DEVELOPMENT FOCUS - By gathering feedback and identifying areas for improvement, the company ensures the successful transformation into an AI-driven organization and demonstrates a focus on employee development by incorporating their feedback.
goals.framework3E: EXPAND - This goal expands the knowledge base and best practices for AI implementation within the department, contributing to strategic organizational goals.
goals.coreValue: FROM ME TO WE - This goal values everyone's input by actively seeking feedback from managers and employees to improve the AI system.
